featured.text: Type ABs are artistic but mysterious and unpredictable, and type Bs are cheerful but eccentric, individualistic, and selfish.
15 decades of investigation, there is no consensus on exactly what causes the beautiful and mysterious phenomenon of crown shyness.

definition.zh_def: 神秘的，難以理解或解釋的。
definition.en_def: Difficult to understand or explain; having an enigmatic quality.
definition.example: The old mansion had a mysterious aura that intrigued the visitors.
